action.action-desc: Mr. Kennedy of Utah introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970 to require royalties on production from leased geothermal resources to be based on production from each electric generating facility, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Geothermal Royalty Reform Act.
Section 5(a)(1) of the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970 (30 U.S.C. 1004(a)(1)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting with respect to each electric generating facility producing electricity from such resources, before not less than; and
by inserting by such facility after produced; and
by inserting with respect to each electric generating facility producing electricity from such resources, before not less than; and
by inserting by such facility after produced.
